## Chess.inCheckmate() method

Returns true or false if the side to move has been checkmated.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
inCheckmate(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

## Example


```js
const chess = new Chess(
    'rnb1kbnr/pppp1ppp/8/4p3/5PPq/8/PPPPP2P/RNBQKBNR w KQkq - 1 3'
)
chess.inCheckmate()
// -> true

```
